name: Iced Widow
description: This powerful indica combines the high THC content of ICE with the prized White Widow.  Iced Widow's compact stature and quick flowering time have made this strain popular among growers of any experience level, while the potency and diesel flavors demand attention from the hardest hitting indica fans. The strong and long-lasting effects make it an ideal solution when combatting chronic pain.
descriptionPlain: This powerful indica combines the high THC content of ICE with the prized White Widow.  Iced Widow's compact stature and quick flowering time have made this strain popular among growers of any experience level, while the potency and diesel flavors demand attention from the hardest hitting indica fans. The strong and long-lasting effects make it an ideal solution when combatting chronic pain.

highlightedReviews.text:
Got a 1/2 ounce of Top shelf Medical grade Iced widow, a.k.a White Castle. 

The flavors of this strain remind me of Northern lights or a funky Jack Herer clone. very piney, a hint of menthol behind it. This strain STINKS due to the amount of trichomes, stink proof baggies needed, goodwich bags will do the smell no defense
the flavor is something way different from your usual bud, Woody, mentholy, and, to be honest, it tasted a bit like spice, Game over to be specific.
overall this weed is an AMAZING painkiller and is excellent for rolling one up for your friends. 9/10

More frequently labelled as “White Castle” this is actually a pretty balanced hybrid strain, (About 60-40 Indica dominant). Very euphoric strain with a medium body high. Good daytime smoke that simultaneously relaxes you, but also leaves you  fairly energetic and sociable. Not my absolute favourite but a good flower nonetheless.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Santa Maria, White Elephant, Critical Sensi Star, Critical 47, and Iced Widow
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Happy Halloween, Leafly friends! We've started adding your requests to the Leafly Explorer, so be sure to check out all of our newest additions. Here are five of our new favorites for you to read up on and try out this holiday weekend if they're available in your area. Enjoy!
   1. Santa Maria
Characteristics of Santa Maria:

75% sativa 
Cross between a Brazilian sativa, Mexican Haze, and Silver Pearl
Fruity, flowery aroma
Uplifting, energetic, and arousing effects

   2. White Elephant
Characteristics of White Elephant:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between White Widow and Purple Elephant
Breeder: Rare Dankness Seeds
Grape and berry aroma
Relaxing, energetic, and uplifting effects
May help with stress and depression

   3. Critical Sensi Star
Characteristics of Critical Sensi Star:

90% indica strain
Cross between Critical Mass and Sensi Star
Breeder: Delicious Seeds
Lemon, grapefruit, and skunky aroma 
Relaxing, happy effects
May help with insomnia, muscle spasms, or high stress levels.

   4. Critical 47
Characteristics of Critical 47:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Critical Mass and AK-47
Mango, peach, and vanilla aroma
Happy, relaxing effects

   5. Iced Widow
Characteristics of Iced Widow:

Mostly indica 
Cross between ICE and White Widow
Diesel aroma
Heavy, long-lasting effects
May help with chronic pain
